name: VoiceofKorea
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Voice of Korea (formerly known as Radio Pyongyang) is a broadcasting service in Korea which also publishes news on its website. This skill takes the feed directly from the website and reads it out. For further details, feel free to visit the website at http://www.vok.rep.kp/index.php/home/main/en/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
